comments:
We are developing a tracing tool, which simultanously fills trace and log model. Therefore we'r using an own xml based collection protocol via RAC and our own XML Fragment Loaders to fill these data models. Immediatly after an attach to our trace agent in the profiling monitoring view, we get a "start"-message and create a second TRCAgent-Object in the workbench to fill in the log entries. 

When switching to another perspective while the creation is still in progress, we get the following exception:

Thread[xmlParserThread,6,main] - fragmentsCount=1: org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2942)

sorry .. this happens after "start profiling" not "attach".
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 138185 ***
